events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to receipt of an incorrect item in the order.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect order item.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund for the wrong item received.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and a copy of your order confirmation for verification?
I have attached the photos of the wrong product and my order confirmation as you requested for your review.
We apologize for the mistake. We will process a full refund immediately and provide you with a prepaid return label.
Thank you for the quick response and refund offer. I appreciate your help resolving this issue promptly.
Your refund has been successfully processed and the return label sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We wanted to check in and make sure the refund and return process was satisfactory and everything has been resolved to your satisfaction.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing your case now. Feel free to contact us again if you need any further support.
